sect1.title: svn move/mv/rename/ren
sect1.para: svn move, svn mv, svn rename or svn ren. These commands move files from one location to another. One of the (many) complaints against CVS was that it had no concept of 1) moving files or 2) versioning directories. If you needed to move a file, it was generally better to do it on the server manually. With Subversion, it's all a piece of cake. Note that the changes will only be reflected on the Subversion server after you run the svn commit command.
